CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Carnet_Tariff_Price__c = Price_Book__r.Standard_12__c, Carnet_Tariff_Price__c = Price_Book__r.Standard_24__c, Carnet_Tariff_Price__c = Price_Book__r.Standard_36__c, Carnet_Tariff_Price__c = Price_Book__r.Prepaid_12__c, Carnet_Tariff_Price__c = Price_Book__r.Prepaid_24__c), True, False)
CustomField.label: Standard Carnet Tariff
